about_the_game:
In the depths of a dilapidated server room, a series of data search and restoration programs are ran to try and discover secrets long abandoned.

In Electrokinetic, you can explore this data space as ever changing 3D levels, delving into an environment that becomes more hostile and harder to navigate the deeper you go.

[BUILD YOUR OWN PLATFORMING TOOLSET]

Craft your own moveset as you progress through a run. Electrokinetic takes inspiration from all sorts of platformers- you'll see many classic moves as well as brand new ones! Discover all the nuances and synergies between different abilities to pull off tons of fun maneuvers!

You can change the function of your jump, air jump, dash, slide, attack, and more, all with great care taken to make sure each button press feels smooth and responsive.

[A ROGUELIKE WITH NO WALLS]

Levels are randomly generated in an open grid format, where every tile can change how you tackle the one next to it. You'll want to collect as much as you can before moving on, but watch out! The deeper you go, the more aggressive the automatic security protocols get, and once you get detected, things get rough!

Collect special bytes to bring back to the home system, with which you can unlock new characters and starting upgrades to bring with you. Find the loadout that works best for you!

In the depths of a dilapidated server room, a series of data search and restoration programs are ran to try and discover secrets long abandoned.

In Electrokinetic, you can explore this data space as ever changing 3D levels, delving into an environment that becomes more hostile and harder to navigate the deeper you go.

You can change the function of your jump, air jump, dash, slide, attack, and more, all with great care taken to make sure each button press feels smooth and responsive.

Levels are randomly generated in an open grid format, where every tile can change how you tackle the one next to it. You'll want to collect as much as you can before moving on, but watch out! The deeper you go, the more aggressive the automatic security protocols get, and once you get detected, things get rough!

short_description: Electrokinetic is a roguelike 3D platformer where you build your own moveset as you play. Traverse a variety of tight platforming levels with abilities new and old, trying to find secrets long missing in a randomly generated cyberscape.
